concept.title: Implementing Redirects
concept.shortdesc: In order to capture Analytics data from redirects, four minor alterations need to be made to the code that creates the redirect and the AppMeasurement for JavaScript file.

conbody.p: Completing the following steps will retain the information that the original referrer (for example, http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&ie=UTF-8&q=discount+airline+tickets in the scenario above) passes to your site:
